original_title: Update: Daily Mirror’s quick action leads to removal of hazardous tree branch
original_body_lines: Colombo, May 27 (Daily Mirror) - Quick action by the Daily Mirror breaking news exposing the wayside hazard of a shattered branch of a mango tree hanging over the pavement along the Anagarika Dharmapala Mawatha in Colombo drew a similar quick response by the Colombo Municipal Council (CMC) and was removed by the CMC’s Disaster Management Unit a short while ago.
